lead_paragraph: The World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) said on Wednesday that a second report from Richard McLaren, whose initial probe confirmed allegations of a broad doping scheme in Russian sport, will be released in early December.

headline.print_headline: WADA Says Second McLaren Report Due in Early December
headline.main: WADA Says Second McLaren Report Due in Early December

snippet: The World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) said on Wednesday that a second report from Richard McLaren, whose initial probe confirmed allegations of a broad doping scheme in Russian sport, will be released in early December....
